description: The government prohibits gatherings of more than 5,000 people to try to stop coronavirus spreading.
title: Coronavirus: France bans large indoors gatherings in bid to curb virus
title_page: Coronavirus: France bans large indoors gatherings in bid to curb virus - BBC News
maintext: The US has reported its first death from the virus, in the north-west state of Washington. Details of the person's identity have not yet been released, but officials said they would give a press conference at about 21:00 GMT.
